name: Fluffy Friends
description: In front of you is a spectacular game with interesting, unusual gameplay, a puzzle game involving your creativity, where YOU have to figure out how to pass the levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: any
